title: Simnel cake
description: This traditional Easter fruit cake is topped with 11 spheres of homemade marzipan, representing all the Apostles, minus Judus. Decorate with a wide yellow ribbon.
ingredients: 225g/8oz icing sugar, plus at least 3 tbsp for rolling
1 well-scrubbed orange, freshly squeezed juice and finely grated zest
1 unwaxed lemon, freshly squeezed juice and finely grated zest
175g/6oz butter, softened, plus extra for greasing
